subject: Hockey, Ice
Fenway Park (Boston)
lead_paragraph: The Bruins owner Jeremy Jacobs plans to ring in the new year by rooting for his team at Fenway Park. Jacobs said he expected the N.H.L.’s third annual Winter Classic, played outdoors on Jan. 1, to be at the home of the Boston Red Sox. He said an official announcement from the league could come in July. “Everything I’ve seen acts like, looks like, smells like it’s going to be in Boston,” Jacobs said. “I don’t know of anybody else that’s gone through all of the search and process” to prepare for the game. The first two Winter Classics were played at Buffalo’s Ralph Wilson Stadium and Chicago’s Wrigley Field.
